stev.kwikemart

Class Upc

  • java.lang.Object
    • stev.kwikemart.Upc

  • public final class Upc
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for parsing and checking a UPC.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hallé

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String generateCode(java.lang.String prefix)
      Generates a UPC code by affixing a check digit to a 11-character prefix.
      static int getCheckDigit(java.lang.String prefix)
      Computes the check digit of a UPC code
      static int getDigit(java.lang.String c)
      Gets a digit out of a one-character string

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • generateCode

        public static final java.lang.String generateCode(java.lang.String prefix)
        Generates a UPC code by affixing a check digit to a 11-character prefix.
        Parameters:
        prefix - The prefix
        Returns:
        The code with the check digit added at the end

      • getDigit

        public static final int getDigit(java.lang.String c)
        Gets a digit out of a one-character string
        Parameters:
        c - The string
        Returns:
        The digit, or -1 if no digit could be extracted from the string

      • getCheckDigit

        public static final int getCheckDigit(java.lang.String prefix)
        Computes the check digit of a UPC code
        Parameters:
        prefix - The UPC code
        Returns:
        The check digit. The value -1 is returned if the UPC code is invalid in some other way.
